languages.text: {n}Паскаль запрокидывает голову, и мощь, переполнявшая его голос, выплескивается вовне. Голос техножреца гремит на весь корабль, подхваченный каждым вокс-динамиком каждой палубы.{/n} "Когда-то я был частью великого целого. Когда-то я был одним из многих. Мы прозрели ужас грядущего, мы восстали против него. И мы оказались недостойны открывшегося нам знания".

{n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power brimming in his voice rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I was once part of a great whole. I was once but one of many. We gleaned the horror that lay ahead, and we rebelled against it. Yet we proved unworthy of the knowledge revealed to us."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль запрокидывает голову, и мощь, переполнявшая его голос, выплескивается вовне. Голос техножреца гремит на весь корабль, подхваченный каждым вокс-динамиком каждой палубы.{/n} "Когда-то я был частью великого целого. Когда-то я был одним из многих. Мы прозрели ужас грядущего, мы восстали против него. И мы оказались недостойны открывшегося нам знания".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power his voice has been brimming with overflows and rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I was once part of a great whole. I was once but one of many. We had gleaned the horror that lay ahead, and we had rebelled against it. Yet we proved unworthy of the knowledge revealed to us."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルは頭をのけぞらせると、あふれんばかりの力を込めた声を洪水のようにとめどなく発する。技術司祭の声は船中に響き渡り、全デッキの全ヴォクス・スピーカーにこだまする。{/n}「自分はかつて、偉大な存在の一部だった。自分はかつて、大勢のひとりにすぎなかった。我らは降り注ぐ恐怖を探り、抵抗したが、我らが明らかにしてきた知識は無力だとわかった」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power brimming in his voice rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I was once part of a great whole. I was once but one of many. We gleaned the horror that lay ahead, and we rebelled against it. Yet we proved unworthy of the knowledge revealed to us."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは頭をのけぞらせると、あふれんばかりの力を込めた声を洪水のようにとめどなく発する。技術司祭の声は船中に響き渡り、全デッキの全ヴォクス・スピーカーにこだまする。{/n}「自分はかつて、偉大な存在の一部だった。自分はかつて、大勢のひとりにすぎなかった。我らは降り注ぐ恐怖を探り、抵抗したが、我らが明らかにしてきた知識は無力だとわかった」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡仰起头来，声音中的力量像洪水一样磅礴而出。技术神甫洪亮的声音响彻全舰，回荡在每个甲板的音阵装置中。{/n}“我曾是伟大整体的一部分，只是众多意识中的其中一员。我们意识到前方的恐怖，并竭力反抗。然而，事实证明，我们不配领受那揭示给我们的知识。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power brimming in his voice rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I was once part of a great whole. I was once but one of many. We gleaned the horror that lay ahead, and we rebelled against it. Yet we proved unworthy of the knowledge revealed to us."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡仰起头来，声音中的力量像洪水一样磅礴而出。技术祭司洪亮的声音响彻全舰，回荡在每个甲板的音阵装置中。{/n}“我曾是伟大整体的一部分，只是众多意识中的其中一员。我们意识到前方的恐怖，并竭力反抗。然而，事实证明，我们不配领受那揭示给我们的知识。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal rejette la tête en arrière et toute la puissance de sa voix se déverse dans le vaisseau telle une inondation, relayée par les synthétiseurs-vox sur tous les ponts.{/n} « Il fut un temps où je faisais partie d'un tout. Il fut un temps où je n'étais qu'un parmi tant d'autres. Nous avons eu un aperçu des horreurs que nous réservait l'avenir, et nous avons décidé de nous rebeller. Pourtant, nous nous sommes montrés indignes des connaissances qui nous avaient été révélées. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power brimming in his voice rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I was once part of a great whole. I was once but one of many. We gleaned the horror that lay ahead, and we rebelled against it. Yet we proved unworthy of the knowledge revealed to us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal rejette la tête en arrière et toute la puissance de sa voix se déverse dans le vaisseau telle une inondation, relayée par les synthétiseurs-vox sur tous les ponts.{/n} « Il fut un temps où je faisais partie d'un tout. Il fut un temps où je n'étais qu'un parmi tant d'autres. Nous avons eu un aperçu des horreurs que nous réservait l'avenir, et nous avons décidé de nous rebeller. Pourtant, nous nous sommes montrés indignes des connaissances qui nous avaient été révélées. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal echa la cabeza hacia atrás y el poder que emana de su voz fluye como un torrente de agua. La voz atronadora del tecnosacerdote se escucha en toda la nave, resonando en todos los altavoces de voco de la cubierta.{/n} «He sido parte de un todo. He sido solo uno entre muchos. Descubrimos la pesadilla que se avecinaba y nos rebelamos contra ella, pero demostramos ser indignos del conocimiento que se nos reveló».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power brimming in his voice rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I was once part of a great whole. I was once but one of many. We gleaned the horror that lay ahead, and we rebelled against it. Yet we proved unworthy of the knowledge revealed to us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal echa la cabeza hacia atrás y el poder que emana de su voz fluye como un torrente de agua. La voz atronadora del tecnosacerdote se escucha en toda la nave, resonando en todos los altavoces de voco de la cubierta.{/n} «He sido parte de un todo. He sido solo uno entre muchos. Descubrimos la pesadilla que se avecinaba y nos rebelamos contra ella, pero demostramos ser indignos del conocimiento que se nos reveló».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal legt den Kopf in den Nacken, und die Kraft in seiner Stimme ergießt sich wie eine Flut. Die dröhnende Stimme des Techpriesters ist auf dem gesamten Schiff zu hören, hallt aus jedem Vox-Lautsprecher auf jedem Deck.{/n} "Ich war einst Teil eines großen Ganzen. Ich war einst nur einer von vielen. Wir haben das Grauen gesehen, das vor uns lag, und haben dagegen rebelliert. Doch wir haben uns als unwürdig des Wissens erwiesen, das uns offenbart wurde."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power brimming in his voice rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I was once part of a great whole. I was once but one of many. We gleaned the horror that lay ahead, and we rebelled against it. Yet we proved unworthy of the knowledge revealed to us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal legt den Kopf in den Nacken, und die Kraft in seiner Stimme ergießt sich wie eine Flut. Die dröhnende Stimme des Techpriesters ist auf dem gesamten Schiff zu hören, hallt aus jedem Vox-Lautsprecher auf jedem Deck.{/n} "Ich war einst Teil eines großen Ganzen. Ich war einst nur einer von vielen. Wir haben das Grauen gesehen, das vor uns lag, und haben dagegen rebelliert. Doch wir haben uns als unwürdig des Wissens erwiesen, das uns offenbart wurde."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Başını geriye atan Pasqal'ın sesinden taşan kudret, sel misali yayılıyor. Tekno Rahip'in bütün güvertelerdeki voks hoparlörlerinde yankılanan gür sesi, geminin her yerinde duyuluyor.{/n} "Bir zamanlar büyük bir bütünün parçasıydım. Bir zamanlar çokluk içinde birdim. İleride bekleyen dehşeti öğrendik, ona başkaldırdık. Yine de bize açık edilen irfana layık olamadık."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power brimming in his voice rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I was once part of a great whole. I was once but one of many. We gleaned the horror that lay ahead, and we rebelled against it. Yet we proved unworthy of the knowledge revealed to us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal başını geriye atıyor ve sesinden taşan kudret, bir sel gibi yayılıyor. Tekno Rahip'in gürleyen sesi bütün güvertelerdeki bütün voks hoperlörlerde yankılanıyor, gemi boyunca duyuluyor.{/n} "Bir zamanlar büyük bir bütünün parçasıydım. Bir zamanlar çokluk içinde birdim. İleride bekleyen dehşeti öğrendik ve ona başkaldırdık. Yine de bize açık edilen irfana layık olmadığımızı ispatladık."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
